properties.name: Evacuation Shelter as of 6:00PM on 3/27/12
properties.description: The West Jefferson Middle School will become the evacuation shelter at 6:00 PM.  The evacuation shelter located at Conifer High School will shut down at 6:00PM.  The move is being made in order to allow the Incident Management Team to set up their Command Post at the larger facilities available at Conifer High.  500+ firefighters will also be sharing Conifer High along with the Incident Management Team.
